description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Upto 6 players or robots compete to take over the game board in this easy to pick up but hard to master board game.  Place and grow your atoms to lead to large chain reactions that capture the board.  Save your wins and replay them at your lesure.  6 players localy or online play.
